NoLineWrap.description:
Description

Checks that chosen statements are not line-wrapped. By default, this
Check restricts wrapping import and package statements, but it's possible to check
any statement.
NoLineWrap.option:
tokens, tokens to check, subset of tokens

IMPORT
,
STATIC_IMPORT
,
PACKAGE_DEF
,
CLASS_DEF
,
METHOD_DEF
,
CTOR_DEF
,
ENUM_DEF
,
INTERFACE_DEF
,
RECORD_DEF
,
COMPACT_CTOR_DEF
.
,

PACKAGE_DEF
,

,

.
